message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal for a high-quality item. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in your product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140 to make this work. It's still a good deal considering the quality of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $140. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
